Package controller

Class ModProdController

java.lang.Object
controller.ModProdController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModProdController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Displays and controls the Modify Product Screen.

    • fillForm

      public void fillForm(int selectedIndex, int productId, String productName, double productPrice, int productStock, int productMin, int productMax)
      Places the parameter values from the selected product into the text fields of the Modify Product screen.
      Parameters:
      selectedIndex - the index of the selected Product
      productId - the ID of the selected Product
      productName - the name of the selected Product
      productPrice - the price of the selected Product
      productStock - the inventory level of the selected Product
      productMin - the minimum inventory level of the selected Product
      productMax - the maximum inventory level of the selected Product

    • onSaveProdMod
